description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Under the supervision of Otis Vietnam, Managing Director, the incumbent is responsible for:
              

              •	Develop strategies and action plans for Service Sales.
              
              •	Effectively supervise all service employees to achieve the business objectives
              
              •	Ensure that all subordinates flawless apply OTIS policies and procedure
              
              •	Responsible for entire projects with its sales analysis and how service performance
              

              Duties & Responsibilities
              

              •	Develops business plan for annual sales target and assigns to each team member to achieve Business plan of Otis Vietnam
              

              •	Leads the team to establish their monthly plan for achieving goals, collection.
              

              •	Directs and supervises team members for corrective activities on customer’s demands and company policies.
              

              •	Reviews estimations, negotiations and contract documents to decide each project‘s selling prices, having compliance with company policy
              

              •	Works closely with managers in others departments on updating policies and procedures for customer services as well as to solve internal conflicts
              

              •	Monitors customer preferences to determine the focus of sales efforts.
              

              •	Keeps update for business strategy.
              

              •	Visits sites and meets customers with recommendations on a regular basis and to share with colleagues or report to country MD
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	University graduate in business, Engineering (electrical or mechanical) or equivalent
              

              •	At least 5 years at the same position.
              

              •	Knowledge of elevator operation and contract management
              

              •	Strong sales ability matched with a proven track record
              

              •	Good interpersonal ability required
